mapper.insert: INSERT INTO communityReply ( reply_num, memberidx, community_num, content, created, updated, parent_comment_num, blind ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMUNITYREPLY.NEXTVAL, #{memberIdx}, #{community_num}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT reply_num, c.memberidx, nickname, community_num, content, created, updated, parent_comment_num, blind FROM communityreply c JOIN member m ON m.memberidx = c.memberidx WHERE community_num = #{community_num} OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
